item.description:
This is Part 1 of 4 in the Witchcraft Training Series

This is the first level, in the series of (4), of training towards the
Level of the First Degree towards Priest/ Priestess training.

Classes are done online in Skype, every other Monday evening beginning Feb 7th from
7:00- 9:00 pm. Members will listen and participate in a "Live" class, become members of an online
email group in yahoo, and receive all the the paperwork via "Word" files to fill a 2 inch binder for each level. Classes are $50.00 per level, and can be paid through paypal, or by personal check.

Please register asap by emailing to talawolf7@webtv.net with your:
Name
Address
Phone
Email
Skype ID

All payments and registration must be received by Feb 4th.



My first online class is graduating in Jan 2011!! :)

Class Schedule is as follows:

Classes will be Tuesday evenings from 7:00-9:00 pm

Classes to begin:

Class l - Mon, Feb 7th

The difference between Wicca & Witchcraft
Wiccan Glossary
Wiccan Beliefs
Wiccan Rede
3-Fold Law
Pentacle & Pentagram

Class 2 - Mon, Feb 21st

The Wiccan Way
History of Paganism
The Burning Times
Salem Witch Trials

Class 3 - Tues, March 7th

Important Pagan People
Witches Rede of Chivalry
Intro to the (8) Sabbats
The Esbats
The Elements
13 Goals of a Witch

Class 4 - Mon, March 21st

Principles of Pagan Belief
The Moon & Her Phases
The God & The Goddess
Pagan Ettiquette
Wiccan Traditions
Familiars

Class 5 - Mon, April 4th

Rites of Passage (indepth)
Intro to Gardnerian Wicca
Covens & Degree Systems
Initiation
How to Meditate/ Group Exercise

Class 6 - Tues, April 11th

Intro to Ritual
Book of Shadow/ Grimoires
Numerology/ How to find your Witch Name
How to find a "Healthy" Coven/ Teacher/ Group
Class Activity: Psychic Exercises
Dedication

Class 7- April 25th
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Level 2 Classes will begin in May.
Each course builds upon the other.

To check out information on all of the levels, view pictures and testimonials of previous students, go to:

http://pathofthewitch...


Please note: This will be the last Level One class offered until Winter 2014.
Where
Online
Wolf Hill Grove

Registration information will be sent to the list after the holidays :)
item.name: Online "Live" Witchcraft Training- Level 1 Intro To Wicca
